record.dc:title: 4BN3 Danville Ferry, Benton County, Tennessee. Feature 1. Charred bones in a shallow pit, included in charred organic material 1. Possible that there are some human bones included. Square 49CA. Direction East.
record.wpa:narrative: An area of charred earth and vegetable matter mingled with burned bones, some of these possibly human. A slight pit intrusive into the sand.
record.wpa:comments: Institution has small illustration of feature on file.
